Description: To verify that channel user cannot hit SOS request through EXTGW with SOS wallet as owner if SOS is not allowed for the user.
To verify that channel user's SOS request is not processed for owner wallet if channel user is not allowed as receiver as per user life cycle.
To verify that channel user's SOS request is not processed for owner wallet if channel user's previous SOS request is pending for settlement.
To verify that channel user's SOS request is not processed if invalid product code is entered in the request.
To verify that channel user's SOS request is not processed if invalid external code is entered in the request.
To verify that channel user's SOS request is not processed if  product code is not entered in the request.
To verify that channel user's SOS request is not processed if  external code is not entered in the request.
To verify that  SOS request is not processed through EXTGW with SOS wallet as owner if owner is not allowed as sender as per user life cycle.
To verify that  SOS request is not processed through EXTGW with SOS wallet as owner if owner doesn't have sufficient balance in the defined product wallet.
To verify that SOS request is not processed through wallet as owner if initiator channel user is in top level hierarchy.
To verify that channel user cannot hit SOS request through EXTGW with SOS wallet as owner if user's balance is more than SOS threshold amount.
To verify that channel user's SOS request is not processed if invalid language code is entered in the request.
